levels.title: Find Me
levels.description:
Help me find a a place I can call home.

Flag Format: flag{.......} #NoSpaces

After here head on to Somalia

levels.title: Bad Reputation
levels.description:
Thank you for finding my home, but there are some rumors here at home that someone in the online real, who used to stay here is damaging our reputation.

I just got his first and last name (Alshabab Alwatani), Kindly help me track his current location.

Flag Format: flag{....-....} #NoSpaces

levels.title: Tracking
levels.description:
So we found his current location, I have a mission now... One goal, one aim.. Tracking him down....

A little mouse informed me that he loves "SEA FOOD"!! yeah.. ohhhh and he loves science too, check out the "Da Vinci Science Center".

Beware of your surrounding, we need to find him when he is distracted.

Flag Format: flag{.....-.-....-...-...-....} #Nospaces 
#All lowercase
levels.hint: Traveled from Somalia to USA, good job... but do you are a tourist.. get familiar with the ground.

levels.title: Like Father Like Son
levels.description:
So we found his favorite restaurant, but we missed him.... I got the little mouse to talk again, he had a past the dad is a CEO of some corporation ... that produces dairy products.. but before that he used to own another company that produced dairy and non dairy products... I guess we will track down his family then.. You know what to do young soldier!!

Don't worry leave the dirty work for me... and pass by here southseasfoods dot com at port 80 and pick me up some sea food!!

Hurry up young soldier and find me the Dad, I hear he loves to tweet alot.

Flag Format: flag{@.........}

levels.title: Friendships
levels.description:
So I guess you found the dad, but also you noticed that he was active for a period of like a year, you also found the company he was a CEO to... It seems like the dad is a dead end.... let me go make our little mouse squeak, meanwhile go check if the dad had any friends, co-workers or connections at the corp, and see if they will bear any fruits.

Flag Format: flag{L.....}
levels.hint: What you seek is just right infront of you, some scrolling, typing and boom !!

levels.title: Seeking Justice
levels.description:
So I guess you found the dad's friend!! I can smell blood, the end of our mission is almost here ... The mouse broke, Lavish went to a new business Beverages so called drinklavish... The little mouse said he saw our target chatting around "LavishGrindENT" he so called it...

Find him, give me his first and last name... and leave the rest to me.

Flag Format: flag{....-.....} #Nospaces
levels.hint: Little Mouse Added that he is a Detroit Rapper, Entrepreneur, and Model.

levels.title: Example
levels.description:
are you a pwner or from Pwn3rs?
